issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In an automated test run there are some cases when instances will stay in pending forever. I have seen a few incidents already:

Artifacts of one such failure can be found here:
http://jenkins.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/qa-testunit/1797/artifact/artifacts/

{code}
2013-04-07 15:41:10  INFO 000001377 StatefulMessageSet       | :1365374470474:StatefulMessageSet:VM_STARTING:FAILED:CREATE_VMS:CC_21:ExecutionException
2013-04-07 15:41:10 ERROR 000001348 AsyncRequest             | java.lang.RuntimeException: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:VmRunType:f7f3d384-e510-42b7-b94a-8cd7fbff4e8f:return=true:epoch=37:status=null i-828E3EDA networkIndex=15 vlan=459

fields.summary: Failure to launch BFEBS instance, stays in pending

comments.body:
CC logs show that there was an error parsing remote device string

{noformat}
2013-04-07 15:41:10 DEBUG 000012866 doRunInstances           | running instance i-828E3EDA
2013-04-07 15:41:10 DEBUG 000012866 doRunInstances           | assigning MAC/IP: D0:0D:82:8E:3E:DA/0.0.0.0/10.211.89.47/15
2013-04-07 15:41:10 DEBUG 000012866 schedule_instance_roundr | scheduler using ROUNDROBIN policy to find next resource
2013-04-07 15:41:10 DEBUG 000012866 schedule_instance_roundr | scheduler state starting at resource 0
2013-04-07 15:41:10 DEBUG 000012866 schedule_instance_roundr | scheduler state finishing at resource 0
2013-04-07 15:41:10 ERROR 000012866 doRunInstances           | failed to parse remote dev string in VBR[0]
2013-04-07 15:41:10 ERROR 000012866 doRunInstances           | scheduler could not find resource to run the instance on
2013-04-07 15:41:10 ERROR 000012866 doRunInstances           | unable to run input instance
2013-04-07 15:41:10 ERROR 000012866 RunInstancesMarshal      | doRunInstances() failed 1
{noformat}

Debugging why CC is not happy about the device string

CLC creates and attaches all the volumes for a boot from ebs instance in two separate steps. The first step is to fire a create volume request to SC and store a corresponding volume attachment entity in the database. The second step involves fetching the volume attachment records from the database and firing off the attach requests to SC. The response from the attach requests contains the remote device string thats passed on to CC. 

The database lookup for volume attachments in the second step is inconsistent. The results sometimes don't reflect the volume created in the first step. This snowballs into CC receiving a null remote device string and ends up in the instance stuck in "pending" state.
